document_data.name: Felix
document_data.mainbody: '''Felix''' was chief lieutenant in the army of King [[Virdin Bloodfeathers]] of [[Damara]] when they fought the army of [[Zhengyi]] the Witch-King in the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Felix was a member of the [[Citadel of Assassins]], a group closely allied with [[Zhengyi]] the Witch-King of [[Vaasa]].

During the [[Vaasan War]] of the 1350s DR, Felix infiltrated the Damaran army and served as chief lieutenant to the young King Virdin during his campaign against Zhengyi. It was widely believed that Felix betrayed Virdin in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, by making him believe that a fake [[magic]] [[wand]] would enable the Damaran army to cross the [[Ford of Goliad]] undetected, and when the king attempted this gambit, Zhengyi wiped out his forces. King Virdin himself was assassinated as he was watching his army's defeat, and it was further believed that Felix was also responsible for this deed.
